questions.question: What happens if the turn player does not purchase the property space they land on?
How do you win the game?
answers: Have the most money after 20 turns
Be the first to have no money
Be the last player with money left
questions.correctAnswer: Be the last player with money left

questions.question: What do you do when you want to mortgage a property?
answers: The bank will take the property
Flip the title deed card face down and receive money stated
questions.correctAnswer: Flip the title deed card face down and receive money stated

questions.question: Rent is declared by whoever owns it.
What happens when you pass Go?
answers: Give the player on the right $50

questions.question: Which of these are NOT a way to go to jail in Monopoly?
answers: Slapping the player to your left
questions.correctAnswer: Slapping the player to your left

questions.question: What should you do when a player lands on property you own?
When can you make deals and build houses?
There are Three different types of properties.
You cannot make another roll after rolling doubles on dice.
When can you buy houses for your properties?
answers: Owning an entire set of a color
questions.correctAnswer: Owning an entire set of a color
